title: Matchmaking is broken
body:
Hi guys and gals, recently i've been playing normal games and ranked games, and i am saying matchmaking broken because nearly all of my normal's games have at least 1 Diamond elo or platinum in my team, and even i have face againts a challenger from enemy team ( I am only Silver3), and in ranked game literally my whole team except me r actually ranked Bronze 3 and B2, and my enemy team r all Silvers. 
So, I actually wanted to play a game that would be fair and fun, and no 1 side bullying . Whats you guys experience

replies.body: Please wait a moment, you will be assured everything is normal by the riot lapdogs momentarily
facing a Diamond or challenger as silver rank is normal?

Realistically no.

According to riot and the lapdogs, yes.

Wow. Looked at your match history on op.gg.
Jesus. How are you still Silver???????
Not to be negative. But jeez.

Because I can't 1v9, i used 200 Games to rank up from Bronze 5 to silver, then the rest r playing all around silver rank, literally went up to S2 then back to S5 AND then back S3. And so, I am not good enough.
